channel.title: Chances are, you are charging too little
channel.description: If 50% of your customers are on the most expensive "enterprise" plan and none on the basic "startup" plan.

item.title: Chances are, you are charging too little
item.dc:creator: maximus
item.description:
Possible. Ironically, the first wave of the customers all signed to the basic plan but eventually converted to higher tiers, mostly because of the data privacy requirements and local laws (especially in Europe).

Read full topic
item.source: Chances are, you are charging too little

item.title: Chances are, you are charging too little
item.dc:creator: WebSPDY
item.description:
Agreed on this one… Or maybe your basic plan isn’t very useful.
